entry.phrase:
The background color of the symbol. If unset it will be inherited from the parent symbol.
Also see .

entry.para: The size as intended by the designer. May be used for layouting as preferred size.

section.title: Figure

Primitive

entry.phrase:
The background color of the figure. If unset it will be inherited from the parent figure.
Also see .

A code fragment which is executed when the mouse clicks the figure element.
Also see .

A code fragment which is executed when the mouse double clicks the figure element.
Also see .
This defines the border style of the figure element. The syntax of the border definition is described in .

row.entry: A text which will be show as a tooltip when the mouse cursor hovers the element.

entry.phrase:
A code fragment which is executed when the mouse enters the figure element.
Also see .

A code fragment which is executed when the mouse leaves the figure element.
Also see .

An image element. Structural features of Image
Name Type Cardinality Default Description
uri string [0..1]
A URI to the image that should be shown. This can be any URI schema the Java system can resolve.
For example: http://, file:// but also platform://plugin
